oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confirmed at Palm Sunday Service, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), stating that “confirmation of 14 new members of the church was a part of the Palm Sunday service at First Lutheran Church. In the class were, front row, left to right, Myrtis Caroline Jentzen, Earl Kelly Archey, Jean Louis Congdon; back row, left to right, Anita rose Martin, Thelma Claire Freund, Emma Jean Vaughn, Mina Willette Vaupel, Evelyn Nortina Smith, Jane Elizabeth Haury, Margaret Ann Griffin, Mary Irwin Gernert, Catherine Ann Dahlinger, Ann Elizabeth Tyler, and Liddy Irmgard Freeland.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: First Lutheran Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
